name: Cloudy with a Chance of Guano
name_original: Cloudy with a Chance of Guano
description:
In January 2023 we set out to start learning Godot 4. To accomplish this we decided to remake one of our old, simple Unity games - Cloudy with a Chance of Guano. It was a game jam submission on simmer.io circa May 2019. The jam had the following rules:

  • Two colors
  • Minimalism
  • Single input

The game features a bird unloading his bowels onto innocent passersby below. The aim is to hit as many before your "ammo" runs out. The Godot 4 remake features additional game modes and updated graphics

If you wish to learn from this game, the source code and assets are freely available on GitHub:
https://github.com/SleepingColossus/guano
